name: LastResort
description:
It's a go at your own pace collection game made for LibGDXJam 2015-12-18 to 2016-01-17. You need to collect 6 objects scattered throughout space in order to complete the game. Control the ship with thrusters & rotation. Use your mouse to harpoon the objects & tow them to the station.

Watch out for the blue space mines.
